verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*; \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w advanced|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w age|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w make|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Chanaanites, \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou go \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* own \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w kindred|strong="H4138"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* thence \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w must|strong="H0853"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H8033"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* whence thou camest \w out|strong="H3318"\w*?

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* thou \w never|strong="H6435"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* thither.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w native|strong="H4138"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w To|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* thence \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* thee, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* bound \w by|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*; \w only|strong="H7535"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* thither \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* therefore \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* herd, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* departed, carrying something \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* goods \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* forward \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H6965"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Mesopotamia|strong="H0763"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Nachor.

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w he|strong="H6153"\w* \w had|strong="H1581"\w* made \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* lie \w down|strong="H1288"\w* without \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w* near \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w when|strong="H6256"\w* women are wont \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w he|strong="H6153"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w O|strong="H4994"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w meet|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* nigh \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spring|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H0376"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H1571"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* maid \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w down|strong="H5186"\w* thy \w pitcher|strong="H3537"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*: \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w answer|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H8248"\w* thy \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w*: \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w provided|strong="H8248"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*: \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w shown|strong="H3045"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w yet|strong="H2962"\w* \w ended|strong="H3615"\w* \w these|strong="H1931"\w* words \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* Rebecca \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bathuel, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Melcha, \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Nachor \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w having|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w pitcher|strong="H3537"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w*:

\w An|strong="H0376"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* comely maid, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w most|strong="H3966"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H4758"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w she|strong="H2896"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w spring|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w her|strong="H4390"\w* \w pitcher|strong="H3537"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* \w coming|strong="H5927"\w* \w back|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Give|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w a|strong="H4592"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w drink|strong="H1572"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* thy \w pitcher|strong="H3537"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w she|strong="H8248"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w* \w she|strong="H8248"\w* \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w pitcher|strong="H3537"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8354"\w* \w when|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w had|strong="H1581"\w* \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*, \w she|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* thy \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4116"\w* pouring \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pitcher|strong="H3537"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w troughs|strong="H8268"\w*, she \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w back|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H7579"\w*: \w and|strong="H4116"\w* having drawn she gave \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* musing beheld \w her|strong="H0518"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* silence, desirous \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w whether|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w prosperous|strong="H6743"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w*, \w weighing|strong="H4948"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* sicles: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* many \w bracelets|strong="H6781"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* sicles \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w*: \w Whose|strong="H4310"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* art thou? \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*: \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w any|strong="H3426"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* lodge?

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bathuel, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Melcha, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Nachor.

\w And|strong="H4725"\w* \w she|strong="H5973"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w moreover|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: We \w have|strong="H1571"\w* good store \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* \w and|strong="H4725"\w* hay, \w and|strong="H4725"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* \w large|strong="H7227"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* lodge \w in|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w himself|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* adored \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* taken \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H5148"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* straight \w way|strong="H1870"\w* into \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.
